review: this was my first streaming device and I was worried it would be too complicated for me.  Holy Cow!!  It was a three step set up that a preschooler could do and then everything else was so simple....like a dream come true.  View old tv episodes, new movies, old movies...whatever you want.  It takes the mystery out of the selection and with voice recognition you cannot make a mistake.  I just love it and have already recommended it to about a dozen friends.  Terrific!!!!  Love It!!!!!  And, even have paired it with another tv and put the controls on my smartphone.  Thanks Amazon!!!!!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: I bought Fire TV with the gaming package as a Christmas gift for the family. So far it's been a big hit. Between the movies, music, and games, there's been something for everyone. And it's very easy to set up and use. The only criticism I have is that the batteries that were supplied for the voice controlled remote went dead after only a couple of days. I'm guessing that the batteries were old to begin with.
author: brandon sternod
